definitions.text: a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
examples: a high level of care is required
it is all a matter of degree

definitions.text: a specific identifiable position in a continuum or series or especially in a process
examples: at what stage are the social sciences?

definitions.text: an award conferred by a college or university signifying that the recipient has satisfactorily completed a course of study
examples: he earned his degree at Princeton summa cum laude

definitions.text: a measure for arcs and angles
examples: there are 360 degrees in a circle

definitions.text: the highest power of a term or variable
a unit of temperature on a specified scale
examples: the game was played in spite of the 40-degree temperature

definitions.text: the seriousness of something (e.g., a burn or crime)
